function.name: media_fastForward
function.description: This function is used to execute the fast forward function on a TV, audio, or speaker SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to execute the fast forward function.

predefinedCompartment.description: A predefined compartment for organizing devices.
